_header: Jesu as Thou art king of bliss
Subjects: prayers, to Christ; Christ, prayers to
_description: A simple prayer — six monorhyming lines

Lam3.First Lines:
Ihesus as thow art kyng of blysAnd thy modyr tru mayden ysthe
                    wys sayde nay that sche none ysas weche be as sche tru mayden
                    ysSchylome frothfull axys v pater nosterys
Lam3.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes,  and  Claude Jenkins.  
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Lambeth
                Palace.
         2 vols. Cambridge, 1930-32: 5.
